#summary Defines message types for the Receiver class.
#labels API-Doc

_This module inspects the EWrapper class to build a set of Message
types.  In creating the types, it also builds a registry of them that
the Receiver class uses to determine message types to instantiate and
deliver. _

==== isWrapperMethod(name, value) ====

_predicate for wrapper methods _

  {{{
  name : name of class attribute as string
  value : value of class attribute; any object
  returns: True if wrapper method
  }}}
